plot.description: Input plot to annotate genomic region zoom lines from

chrom.description: Chromosome of region to draw zoom lines from, as a string

chromstart.description: Integer start position on chromosome to drawzoom lines from

chromend.description: Integer end position on chromosome to drawzoom lines from

y0.description: A numeric vector or unit object indicating the startingy-values of the zoom line segments

x1.description: A numeric vector or unit object indicating the stoppingx-values of the zoom line segments

y1.description: A numeric vector or unit object indicating the stoppingy-values of the zoom line segments

extend.description: A numeric vector or unit object indicating the lengthto extend straight lines from each endof the zoom line segments

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{y0}, \code{x1}, \code{y1}, or \code{extend} are only givenas numerics or numeric vectors

linecolor.description: A character value specifying zoom line color

lty.description: A numeric specifying zoom line type

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams}object containing relevant function parameters
